dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents vegetation coverage for Portland Metro, Oregon in 1991. The dataset was originally published by the Metro Data Resource Center in February 2001.[The vegetation coverage is mapped with two datasets:1. The natural areas inventory using a manual interpretation of 1989 color infrared aerial photography (approximate data coverage: inside the Metro boundary). See Green Spaces Master Plan. Used the modified USGS Anderson level II classification.2. Remotely sensed data; thematic mapper imagery, 1989-90 (approximate data coverage: outside the Metro boundary).]
